string.name: changelog_400_dev12
string.font:
- Added Video Surface support. 
 - Added support compact layout in support Console, new rich animations. 
 - Major app redesign with improved performance and structure. 
 - Updated app architecture and cleaned up legacy components. 
 - Enhanced stability with improved telemetry integration. 
 - Refined resource handling and UI text for a more consistent experience. 
 - Implemented various actions for the Videos Screen to improve user interactivity and functionality. 
 - Updated Codex to support a 16KB page size, ensuring compatibility with newer Android versions while enhancing overall performance and stability. 
 - Added support for Properties dialog. 
 - Fixed UI issue with Slider, it now animates correctly. 

 - Enjoy, and happy testing!

string.name: changelog_400_dev13
string.font:
- Fixed an issue where scrubbing could cause an ANR crash. 
- Fixed an issue where the slider would jump unexpectedly during seek. 
- Added support for displaying a comprehensive changelog, allowing users to track updates and new features.

string.name: changelog_400_dev14
string.font:
- Implemented an auto-hide controller for a more immersive video playback experience. 
- Introduced a toggle for rotation lock, giving users more control over screen orientation. 
- Addressed several minor bugs across various modules to enhance stability and performance. 
- Improved overall application responsiveness and fixed miscellaneous UI glitches.

string.name: changelog_400_dev15
string.font:
- Added Like/Unlike button in Media Notification 
- Added a Lock controller for the player controller when playing videos, preventing accidental interactions. 
- Fixed issue with Next/Prev button not updating after detecting their availability.

string.name: changelog_400_dev16
string.font: \n- Implemented an Acrylic effect for the Console background, creating an immersive ambient lighting experience. \n- Resolved an issue with state updates that occasionally caused them to fail, ensuring more reliable UI responsiveness.

string.name: changelog_400_dev17
string.font:
- Adjusted parameters of Acrylic background effect for console, enhancing visual depth and clarity. 
- Colorization strategy toggle now switches between default and wallpaper-based themes, offering greater personalization. 
- Fixed an issue where the navigation bar was incorrectly displayed in areas where it should have been hidden. 
- Resolved a problem that caused the Mini-player to appear even when the Console was visible, ensuring a cleaner interface. 
- Introduced a Queue Management UI that intelligently adapts to screen orientation, positioning itself next to the player, similar to the YouTube application.
